All they needed to do was win their games in hand and they would be just three points behind the Hoops in the league table. entry.title: Celtic player criticised after draw against Motherwell
entry.summary: Titles are not decided this early in the season. That has been proven once again. entry.title: Giorgio Chiellini makes superb claim about Celtic Park
entry.summary: It would be safe to say that Giorgio Chiellini is one of the best defenders of all time and he had some pretty positive comments about Celtic Park recently. entry.title: Celtic’s problem is very clear and needs solving quick
entry.summary: Two more dropped points mean that Celtic have well and truly allowed the Rangers to get back into the title race. entry.title: Brendan Rodgers addresses Celtic problem after draw
entry.summary: It was not the result Celtic were looking for, as they dropped two valuable points against Motherwell. entry.title: Ange Postecoglou claims Celtic success gets dismissed
